title: English Puritanisme containing the maine opinions of the rigidest sort of those that are called Puritans in the realme of England / written by William Ames ...
author: Bradshaw, William, 1571-1618.
notes: The English original, published anonymously in 1605, was written by William Bradshaw. William Ames, whose name erroneously appears on the t.p., made a free Latin version, published in 1610 with title: Puritanismus anglicanus. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library and Thomason Collection, British Library.
